about.title: About Panorama Seaside
about.subtitle: Your Home by the Sea
about.description: Located in the picturesque fishing village of Mastichari on the western coast of Kos Island, Panorama Seaside Studios is a family-run complex just steps from the golden sandy beach. Our 9 comfortable studios and apartments offer the perfect base for an authentic Greek island holiday, with the gentle sound of waves and stunning Aegean sunsets right from your balcony.
about.feature1Desc: Just steps from Mastichari's golden sandy beach, with direct access to the crystal-clear Aegean waters.
about.feature2Desc: Genuine Greek warmth from our family to yours — personalized service that makes every guest feel at home.
about.feature3Desc: Clean, well-equipped studios with everything you need — kitchenette, air conditioning, and private balcony.
about.story: Panorama Seaside Studios has been welcoming travelers from around the world to experience the magic of Mastichari and Kos Island. What began as a family dream has blossomed into a beloved beachfront retreat, rated 8.9 out of 10 by over 200 guests. Our small complex of just 9 units means personal attention and a peaceful atmosphere.
about.philosophy: We believe that a great holiday starts with feeling truly at home. Our family-run approach means you'll always find a warm smile and a helpful hand. From the taverna serving fresh Greek dishes to the sun loungers on the sand, everything is designed for relaxation and enjoyment.
about.kosDesc: The island of Kos is a gem of the Dodecanese, blessed with golden beaches, ancient ruins, and vibrant local culture. Mastichari sits on the western coast, a charming fishing village with a pretty harbour, excellent restaurants, and a ferry connection to the island of Kalymnos.
